vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(newOwner != address(0),'New owner can not be zero address');
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
HoldefiPauser.isPause (HoldefiPauser.sol#91-98) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp - paused[index] >= pauseDuration (HoldefiPauser.sol#92-97)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: HoldefiPauser.batchPause (HoldefiPauser.sol#111-117) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: HoldefiPauser.batchUnpause (HoldefiPauser.sol#120-126) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in HoldefiPauser.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (HoldefiPauser.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (HoldefiPauser.sol#49): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Constant 'HoldefiPauser.functionsNum' (HoldefiPauser.sol#64) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES
